name: cadre
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C, + sing/pl verb ] a small group of trained people who form the basic unit of a military, political, or business organization
[ C ] a member of such a group

a small group of trained people who form the basic unit of a military, political, or business organization: I was part of the cadre for a new armored division.
